description: Discover and adopt your favorite tree.
heroDescription: Connect with nature and support real regeneration in northern Spain. Your contribution shapes a living system ‚Äî season by season, tree by tree.
about1: Joyland is a regenerative agriculture initiative in northern Spain. Not a financial investment, but an authentic connection.
about2: When you adopt a tree, you support regenerative practices that care for the soil, protect biodiversity, and create resilient ecosystems.
about3: You will receive updates on your tree's progress, seasonal photos, and the products it generates. A genuine way to reconnect with the land.
galleryDescription: Views of our small regenerative paradise
included1Desc: GPS access to your tree with exact coordinates. You can visit it anytime.
included2Desc: Monthly photos of your tree's growth. Videos at key seasons.
included3Desc: Extra virgin olive oil or gourmet almonds depending on your tree. Delivered to your home.
included4Desc: Documentation on the ecological impact and growth of your tree.
included5Desc: Your adoption supports regenerative agriculture and biodiversity conservation.
included6Desc: You can gift it with a personalized certificate. A gift that grows.
